HGL Complete Creature Bundle - Sonics
Pack complet de Créature HGL - Sonics
Vollständiges HGL-Spielfigurenpaket – Sonics

Paquete completo de criatura HGL: Sonics
HGL 완벽한 생명체 번들 - 소닉
HGL Complete Creature Bundle - Sonics
HGL完整生物組合包 - Sonics
HGL完整生物組合包 - Sonics
kDesc

Purchasing this bundle unlocks the Sonics Creature for use in HGL Combat and the HGL Creature Habitat.


This bundle contains:
 HGL Creature Statue - Sonics
 HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Female)
 HGL Foam Hand - Left - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Foam Hand - Right - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Foam Hand - Left - Sonics (Female)
 HGL Foam Hand - Right - Sonics (Female)
 HGL Letterman - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Letterman - Sonics (Female)
 HGL Hoodie - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Hoodie - Sonics (Female) [#Legal]

Acheter ce pack pour déverrouiller la Créature Sonics à utiliser dans HGL Combat et dans l'environnement pour Créature HGL.


Ce pack comprend :
 Statue de Créature HGL - Sonics
 Symbole flottant HGL - Sonics (homme)
 Symbole flottant HGL - Sonics (femme)
 Main en mousse HGL - Gauche - Sonics (homme)
 Main en mousse HGL - Droite - Sonics (homme)
 Main en mousse HGL - Gauche - Sonics (femme)
 Main en mousse HGL - Droite - Sonics (femme)
 Veste HGL - Sonics (homme)
 Veste HGL - Sonics (femme)
 Sweat à capuche HGL - Sonics (homme)
 Sweat à capuche HGL - Sonics (femme) [#Legal]

Mit diesem Paket kannst du die Spielfigur "Sonics" für HGL Combat und den HGL-Unterschlupf freischalten.


Dieses Paket enthält:
 HGL-Statue – Sonics
 HGL-Fansymbol – Sonics (Herren)
 HGL-Fansymbol – Sonics (Damen)
 HGL-Schaumstoffhand – links – Sonics (Herren)
 HGL-Schaumstoffhand – rechts – Sonics (Herren)
HGL-Schaumstoffhand – links – Sonics (Damen)
 HGL-Schaumstoffhand – rechts – Sonics (Damen)
 HGL-Sportjacke – Sonics (Herren)
 HGL-Sportjacke – Sonics (Damen)
 HGL-Kapuzenpulli – Sonics (Herren)
 HGL-Kapuzenpulli – Sonics (Damen) [#Legal]

Acquistando questo pacchetto, sbloccherai la creatura Sonics da utilizzare in HGL Combat e l'habitat della creatura.


Questo pacchetto contiene:
 Statua creatura di HGL - Sonics
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Sonics (uomo)
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Sonics (donna)
 Mano gonfiabile di HGL - Sinistra - Sonics (uomo)
 Mano gonfiabile di HGL - Destra - Sonics (uomo)
 Mano gonfiabile di HGL - Sinistra - Sonics (donna)
 Mano gonfiabile di HGL - Destra - Sonics (donna)
 Giacca Letterman di HGL - Sonics (uomo)
 Giacca Letterman di HGL - Sonics (donna)
 Felpa con cappuccio di HGL - Sonics (uomo)
 Felpa con cappuccio di HGL - Sonics (donna) [#Legal]

Al comprar este paquete, desbloqueas la criatura Sonics para usarla en Combate HGL y en el Hábitat de criatura HGL.


Este paquete contiene:
 Estatua de criatura HGL: Sonics
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Sonics (hombre)
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Sonics (mujer)
 Mano de gomaespuma de HGL: izquierda - Sonics (hombre)
 Mano de gomaespuma de HGL: derecha - Sonics (hombre)
 Mano de gomaespuma de HGL: izquierda - Sonics (mujer)
 Mano de gomaespuma de HGL: derecha - Sonics (mujer)
 Chaqueta de HGL: Sonics (hombre)
 Chaqueta de HGL: Sonics (mujer)
 Sudadera con capucha de HGL: Sonics (hombre)
 Sudadera con capucha de HGL: Sonics (mujer) [#Legal]

이 번들을 구매하시면 HGL 전투와 HGL 생물체 서식지에서 사용할 수 있는 소닉 생명체를 해제할 수 있습니다.


이 번들에는 다음 아이템이 포함됩니다:

 ●HGL 생명체 조각상 - 소닉
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 소닉 (여성)
 ●HGL 폼 손 - 왼쪽 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 폼 손 - 오른쪽 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 폼 손 - 왼쪽 - 소닉 (여성)
 ●HGL 폼 손 - 오른쪽 - 소닉 (여성)
 ●HGL 레터맨 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 레터맨 - 소닉 (여성)
 ●HGL 후디 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 후디 - 소닉 (여성) 

※구입하면, 해당 카테고리에 각 아이템이 추가됩니다.[#Legal]

Purchasing this bundle unlocks the Sonics Creature for use in HGL Combat and the HGL Creature Habitat.


This bundle contains:
 ・HGL Creature Statue - Sonics
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Women)
 ・HGL Foam Hand - Left - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Foam Hand - Right - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Foam Hand - Left - Sonics (Women)
 ・HGL Foam Hand - Right - Sonics (Women)
 ・HGL Letterman - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Letterman - Sonics (Women)
 ・HGL Hoodie - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Hoodie - Sonics (Women) 

※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

購買這個組合包以獲得Sonics生物的使用權，在HGL戰鬥及HGL生物棲息處中使用。


本組合包包括以下道具。

 ●HGL生物塑像 - Sonics
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Sonics(女用)
 ●HGL泡沫塑料手套 - 左手 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL泡沫塑料手套 - 右手 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL泡沫塑料手套 - 左手 - Sonics(女用)
 ●HGL泡沫塑料手套 - 右手 - Sonics(女用)
 ●HGL萊特曼夾克 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL萊特曼夾克 - Sonics(女用)
 ●HGL連帽上衣 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL連帽上衣 - Sonics(女用) 

※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。[#Legal]
